# fmc_host (Data Source)

This data source can read the Host.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "fmc_host" "example" {
  id = "76d24097-41c4-4558-a4d0-a8c07ac08470"
}
```

## Schema

- `id` (String) The id of the object

- `description` (String) Description
